name: Ahh, Crabs!
description:
Hello! Thanks for playing my first game! 

I made this game to submit to the I Can't Draw But Want to Make a Game (Again) game jam!

CONTROLS:

  • arrow keys or wsad to move 
  • spacebar to jump

OBJECTIVE:

  • stomp on the crabbies 
  • don't let the crabbies touch you without giving them a good stompin'
  • stomp 40 crabbies to finish the game and see a cute 1 page comic :3

TIPS:

  • There's no double jump
  • Don't get taken away by the crabs! You might never come back (and will have to refresh the game lol)
  • The "Help" button does nothing, sorry haha

I may make improvements to the game soon. If you have any suggestions, please let me know!
